pluginManager.needNewerCoreVersion: Plugin "{name}" need higher version Typora Community Plugin. Please check for update.

appearance.name: Appearance
appearance.showNotSupportedFileDesc: Not supported file will open with default application.
appearance.keepSearchResultDesc: When you switch to another panel (such as "Files") and then switch back to the search panel, you will not lose the recent search results.
appearance.searchResultFullPathDesc: Hover your cursor over the path and it will show full path in a tooltip.
appearance.fileTabsDesc: Better to enable Setting - General - "Save without asking when switch files on side panel"
